thread.title: S. Floyd, San Francisco Bay Area
thread.title_full: Evermine reviewed by S. Floyd, San Francisco Bay Area

author: S. Floyd, San Francisco Bay Area
title: S. Floyd, San Francisco Bay Area
text: We worked with Travis and he was so understanding regarding the color match for our order. He went above and beyond with making the corrections and reshipping our order. Thank you Evermine for being an outstanding company to work with for our daughter's wedding
